titles.title: Medicare Hearing Aid Coverage Act of 2021
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the exclusion of Medicare coverage for hearing aids and examinations therefor, and for other purposes.
Medicare Hearing Aid Coverage Act of 2021

bill.summary:
Medicare Hearing Aid Coverage Act of 2021
This bill allows for Medicare coverage of hearing aids and related examinations.
The Government Accountability Office must study programs that provide assistance for hearing aids and related examinations for individuals with hearing loss.
